scripts.release-major: changelog -M && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m '(script) updated changelog' && npm version major && git push origin && git push origin --tags
scripts.release-minor: changelog -m && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m '(script) updated changelog' && npm version minor && git push origin && git push origin --tags
scripts.release-patch: changelog -p && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m '(script) updated changelog' && npm version patch && git push origin && git push origin --tags
